# gamefabric_volumestore_retention_policy (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment` (String) The name of the environment the object belongs to.
- `volume_store` (String) The name of the volume store to apply retention policy to.

### Optional

- `offline_snapshot` (Attributes) The retention policy for offline snapshots. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--offline_snapshot))
- `online_snapshot` (Attributes) The retention policy for online snapshots. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--online_snapshot))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique Terraform identifier.

<a id="nestedatt--offline_snapshot"></a>
### Nested Schema for `offline_snapshot`

Optional:

- `count` (Number) Count is the minimum number of offline snapshots to keep.
- `days` (Number) Days is the minimum number of days to keep offline snapshots for.


<a id="nestedatt--online_snapshot"></a>
### Nested Schema for `online_snapshot`

Optional:

- `count` (Number) Count is the minimum number of online snapshots to keep.
- `days` (Number) Days is the minimum number of days to keep online snapshots for.
